GSD.description: png_image_free in png.c in libpng 1.6.x before 1.6.37 has a use-after-free because png_image_free_function is called under png_safe_execute.

advisories.description: png_image_free in png.c in libpng has a use-after-free because png_image_free_function is called under png_safe_execute.

advisories.title: Use After Free
